entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
